name: Project Crearan
description:
CONTROLS: Left and Right Arrow keys to move, Up arrow key to jump. Hold space to draw a line, press x to restart everything.

This little idea had been in my head for a good and long while about now.  I want to take drawing programs and add a bit of a twist to them.  Left things purposefully limited for now as to get you to really think about what you're trying to create.

I have plans to flesh this out more to create a commercially viable product for the future. Feedback is very welcome.
